properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Blessed be God, our God, Who gave for us His well-beloved Son, The gift of gifts, all other gifts in one; Blessed be God, our God!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What will He not bestow! Who freely gave this mighty gift unbought, Unmerited, unheeded, and unsought, What will He not bestow?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He spared not His Son! ’Tis this that silences each rising fear, ’Tis this that bids the hard thought disappear; He spared not His Son!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Who shall condemn us now? Since Christ has died, and ris’n, and gone above, For us to plead at the right hand of Love; Who shall condemn us now?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: ’Tis God that justifies! Who shall recall His pardon or His grace? Or who the broken chain of guilt replace? ’Tis God that justifies!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The victory is ours! For us in might came forth the mighty One; For us He fought the fight, the triumph won: The victory is ours!
